Title: Prohibits the creation and dissemination of synthetic media within sixty days of an election with intent to unduly influence the outcome of an election
Summary: Prohibits the creation and dissemination of synthetic media within sixty days of an election with intent to unduly influence the outcome of an election; makes such act a class E felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to prohibiting the creation and dissemination of synthetic media within sixty days of an election with intent to unduly influence the outcome of an election
